body:
### Welcome to Simple Gifts
[Simple Gifts](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/simple-gifts/ "Simple Gifts") is a Plugin that allows you to send any kinds of gifts (blocks, items and money) to another player.
You will be able to send items that are currently in your hand to the player of your choice. 

### Commands
* /gift - Shows all available commands
* /gift <Playername> - Send the item that is currently in your Hand to the Player.
* /gift <amount> <Playername> - Send x items that are currently in your Hand to the Player.
* /gift money <amount> <Playername> - Send money to the Player.

### Useful Links
[Permissions](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/simple-gifts/pages/main/permissions/ "Permissions")

### Authors and Contributors
Former Author @dreanor created this plugin. If you have any problems feel free to tweet to the original creator [ASC_Dreanor](https://twitter.com/ASC_Dreanor "ASC_Dreanor")

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with anything about this plugin? Please go to [Simple Gifts](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/simple-gifts/ "Simple Gifts") and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
